name: Hotel Kabuki, a Joie de Vivre hotel

reviews.text: Good remodel of the Miyako. Every staff member was exceedingly friendly. Room offered tight quarters between desk and bed, so may not be the best for heavy business. Hotel restaurant very good and plenty of room. Quiet area. Only noise came from loud door latching in hallways. Better soundproofing around doors would help. Taxis have to be called as there are none that wait there. Eat at Florios - 5 blocks away for great food.
reviews.title: Very Friendly Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ate breakfast & dinner at the hotel restaurant, the O Izekaya Lounge & everything was just an awersome experience.Food was great & also the service from the staff.
reviews.title: Hotel restaurant is the best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I just got back from a 6-night stay at Hotel Kabuki, and for the most part, enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: Pretty nice

likes.disliked: — Furniture arrangements and lack of storage space
